name: projectman
description: Hate opening folders? Select and open your projects in your favourite editor straight from your command line without 'CD'ing into the deeply nested folders.

scripts.build:
pkg ./package.json --out-path ./dist || echo '
Please first `npm install -g pkg` to run this command'

author: Saurabh Daware <saurabhdaware99@gmail.com> (https://saurabhdaware.in)
